items.title: Access to ophthalmologists improved from 2014 to 2024, research shows
items.description: Overall access to ophthalmologists improved from 2014 to 2024, according to a research letter published in JAMA Ophthalmology.

items.title: MRIs reveal genetic clues in cerebral palsy
items.description: A national study by University of Adelaide researchers is paving the way for more precise diagnosis and treatment for children with cerebral palsy.
